cause_of_action: refusal to issue a Refugee Travel Document
procedure_followed: Defendant moved to strike the Statement of Claim under Rule 419(1)(a)
decision_reasoning: remedies like declaratory relief or writs against federal boards must be sought via judicial review
Mr. Murray acted under the Crown's prerogative, making him a federal tribunal under the Federal Court Act
result_of_case: Statement of Claim is struck out
potential future judicial review application allowed
